data: The thread "Comprehensive Proposal for Client X" discusses a sales proposal covering features, timelines, and pricing.
The thread "Comprehensive Proposal for Client X" includes a client inquiry about timeline adjustments after reviewing a detailed proposal.
The thread "Comprehensive Proposal for Client X" contains a revised schedule provided by the sales team to meet client deadlines.
The thread "Comprehensive Proposal for Client X" records client approval of the revised schedule and a request for the final contract.
The thread "Comprehensive Proposal for Client X" contains the final contract attached by the sales team for signature.
The thread "Comprehensive Proposal for Client X" reflects a decision to adjust the project timeline according to client feedback and to proceed with contract finalization.
The thread "Comprehensive Proposal for Client X" demonstrates a positive sentiment and successful progression from proposal to contract stage.
